string.name: aboutme
string.a: This is created by Jason Sebastian Aritanto \n I am an SFU student taking CMPT 276 with Brian Fraser \n This app is created for Assignment3

resources.string:
Objective of the game : 
 Find all mines with fewest number of scan 
 Instructions :
 1. Click one of the boxes 
 2. If you found a mine, you can click on the mine to start a scan or click another box
 3. If you do not find a mine it starts a scan.
 4. Once you found all of the mines, you won
 Note: Scan the row and column of the button clicked for mines
